ResearchProjectDef.label: Amor Tentaculum Cultavation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unveil the basic steps to cultavating your own tentacle creatures. Starting with consuming a queen egg.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tentacle Brain Implantation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unveil methods for modifying tentacle eggs to be implanted into humans.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tentacle Structures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to grow or build tentacle structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Queen Host Enhancements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to further enhance host bodies to house Amor tentacles.
